gamesNoPlayers: Please specify some tributes to play the Hunger Games, like so: `{{prefix}}hg Bob, Mark, Jim, Kyra`
gamesTooManyOrFew: I am sorry but the amount of players is less than {{min}} or greater than {{max}}.
